title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 242 of 2025), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000 

(Section 181(2)(a)) (No. 3) Order 2024 (Revocation) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2000 (section 181(2)(a)) (no 3) order 2024 (revocation) order 2025

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 242 of 2025), hereby
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (Section 181(2)(a)) (No.3)
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (Section 181(2)(a)) (No.3) 

Order 2024 (S.I. No. 481 of 2024) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 June, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 

Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 20th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [260] 3
